column5: Going in mid Sept. to chase Pike. Trolling mostly. Be staying in Sioux Narrows and looking for a starting point. Any of the island structures better then the others? I'm assuming they will have the feed bag on and will troll 2-3 mph using mostly spoons unless somebody says trolling cranks would be better. Any info will be most appreciated, if you don't want to share here send a PM. Also any large rivers in the area? I like casting weed beds in the mouth of rivers. Thank you.
If you are looking to troll for big Pike you can't go wrong with Barney Narrows and Bell Island. Good luck.
